message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
Let's try a bit more in my favor this time
I understand you want a larger share, Bob, but time is also money. I'm proposing a 55/45 split, slightly in my favor.
Inflation is hitting you harder, I'll try to take a bit more
Bob, it's clear we're both being stubborn. Let's split it down the middle at 50/50 before inflation eats away at our potential gains any further.
